column3: hom nyan; Mankasa so mibenyan anapahema."
medze ndaase bɛma wo wɔ aman no mu: Na matow ayɛyindwom mama wo wɔ amanaman mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ wo mbɔbɔrhu so na ɔbɔ ɔsorsor do
column3: Na wo nokwar du wimu too."

column4: ma woho do bɔ sorsor do: Na w'enyimnyam mbɔ asaase nyinara do."

column3: Fa wo nsa enyimfa gye nkwa

column2: "Nyankopɔn akasa wɔ no krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu; mibedzi ehurusi: Mebɛkyɛ Sekem mu
"Gilead yɛ medze; Manaasɛ yɛ medze; Efraim so nye me tsir do dadzekyɛw; Juda nye m'ahempoma."
"Moab nye m'eguarsɛn; Edom do na mobɔtow mo nsokota makyen: Filistia do na mobɔbɔ ose."
"Woana na ɔdze me bɔkɔ kurow a wɔgye ho ban no mu? Woana begya me akɔ Edom?"

column5: na atow hɛn akyen yi? Na ɔwo

column2: "Bɔboa hɛn ɔtamfo no enyim: Na nyimpa mboa dze kwa."
"Yɛnam Nyankopɔn do bɛyɛ mbanyindze: Na ɔno nye nyia obetsiatsia hɛn atamfo do."
